name: Beat Around Thee Bush
description:
This is Beat Around Thee Bush! You are President Bushes Body Guard, and you are tasked with keeping him alive at all costs. Block falling objects from hitting George Bush. Don't worry about losing health, you are invincible in this game. But the President isn't. (By the way, if the president is still alive after all the falling objects have passed, just go to the menu and select the next level. I didn't add a win condition.) 

Enjoy!
